Query.CommandText:
SELECT A.HCO_CODE, A.HCO_NAME, MONTH_YEAR, a.YEAR_MONTH, cnt_year_month, max(FP_YEAR_MONTH) as fp_year_month, [3TL_YN], count(distinct cor.hco_code) as FactReady, RDD_READY FROM ( select R.HCO_CODE, HCO_NAME, MONTH_YEAR, YEAR_MONTH, COUNT(YEAR_MONTH) as CNT_YEAR_MONTH, FP_YEAR_MONTH, RDD_READY from (select distinct HCO_CODE, HCO_NAME, min(date) as dt, FORMAT(CONVERT(DATE, min(YYYYMMDD)), 'MM/yy', 'en-US') as MONTH_YEAR, YEARMONTH as YEAR_MONTH from refcal_hco_cross where date between datefromParts(Year(dateadd(MONTH,-13,getdate())),Month(dateadd(MONTH,-13,getdate())),1) and EOMonth(dateadd(MONTH,2,getdate())) group by HCO_CODE, HCO_NAME, yearmonth union select distinct HCO_CODE, HCO_NAME, max(date) as dt ,FORMAT(CONVERT(DATE, max(YYYYMMDD)), 'MM/yy', 'en-US') as MONTH_YEAR, YEARMONTH as YEAR_MONTH from refcal_hco_cross where date between datefromParts(Year(dateadd(MONTH,-13,getdate())),Month(dateadd(MONTH,-13,getdate())),1) and EOMonth(dateadd(MONTH,2,getdate())) group by hco_code, hco_name, yearmonth ) as r left join (select hco_code, min(DISCHARGE_DATE) as discharge_date, CAST(YEAR(min(DISCHARGE_DATE)) AS VARCHAR) + CAST(FORMAT(min(DISCHARGE_DATE), 'MM') AS VARCHAR) AS FP_YEAR_MONTH, max(RDD_READY) as RDD_READY from (select hco_code, discharge_Date, CAST(YEAR(max(DISCHARGE_DATE)) AS VARCHAR) + CAST(FORMAT(max(DISCHARGE_DATE), 'MM') AS VARCHAR) AS FP_YEAR_MONTH, IIF(count(distinct los_qualified) > 1, 1, 0) as RDD_READY
from PORTAL_ENGINE.dbo.factPatient where DISCHARGE_DATE between datefromParts(Year(dateadd(MONTH,-13,getdate())),Month(dateadd(MONTH,-13,getdate())),1) and EOMonth(dateadd(MONTH,2,getdate())) group by hco_code, DISCHARGE_DATE) as f group by hco_code, FP_YEAR_MONTH union select hco_code, max(DISCHARGE_DATE) as discharge_date, CAST(YEAR(max(DISCHARGE_DATE)) AS VARCHAR) + CAST(FORMAT(max(DISCHARGE_DATE), 'MM') AS VARCHAR) AS FP_YEAR_MONTH, max(RDD_READY) as RDD_READY from (select hco_code, discharge_Date, CAST(YEAR(max(DISCHARGE_DATE)) AS VARCHAR) + CAST(FORMAT(max(DISCHARGE_DATE), 'MM') AS VARCHAR) AS FP_YEAR_MONTH, IIF(count(distinct los_qualified) > 1, 1, 0) as RDD_READY from PORTAL_ENGINE.dbo.factPatient where DISCHARGE_DATE between datefromParts(Year(dateadd(MONTH,-13,getdate())),Month(dateadd(MONTH,-13,getdate())),1) and EOMonth(dateadd(MONTH,2,getdate())) group by hco_code, DISCHARGE_DATE) as f group by hco_code, FP_YEAR_MONTH ) as p on r.YEAR_MONTH = p.FP_YEAR_MONTH and r.HCO_CODE = p.HCO_CODE and dt = discharge_date GROUP BY R.HCO_CODE, HCO_NAME, MONTH_YEAR, YEAR_MONTH, FP_YEAR_MONTH, RDD_READY ) AS A JOIN GLOBAL.DBO.REFHCO AS REF ON A.HCO_CODE = REF.HCO_CODE left join (select * from CORRESPONDENCE where notes like 'Fact Ready%') as cor on a.hco_code = cor.HCO_CODE and a.YEAR_MONTH = cor.YEAR_MONTH
WHERE [3TL_YN] <> 0 and NOT (CNT_YEAR_MONTH = 1 and FP_YEAR_MONTH is NULL) group by a.HCO_CODE, a.HCO_NAME, MONTH_YEAR, a.YEAR_MONTH, CNT_YEAR_MONTH, [3TL_YN], RDD_READY order by A.hco_code, YEAR_MONTH DESC
select HCO_CODE, [3TL_YN] from refHCO where [3TL_YN] <> 0 and HCO_CODE = @HCO_CODE

Visibility.Hidden: =SWITCH(LEFT(Fields!MONTH_YEAR.Value,2) = "01",False, LEFT(Fields!MONTH_YEAR.Value,2) = "04", False, LEFT(Fields!MONTH_YEAR.Value,2) = "07", False, LEFT(Fields!MONTH_YEAR.Value,2) = "10", False, LEFT(Fields!MONTH_YEAR.Value,2) = "02", True, LEFT(Fields!MONTH_YEAR.Value,2) = "03", True, LEFT(Fields!MONTH_YEAR.Value,2) = "05", True, LEFT(Fields!MONTH_YEAR.Value,2) = "06", True, LEFT(Fields!MONTH_YEAR.Value,2) = "08", True, LEFT(Fields!MONTH_YEAR.Value,2) = "09", True, LEFT(Fields!MONTH_YEAR.Value,2) = "11", True, LEFT(Fields!MONTH_YEAR.Value,2) = "12", True )

Query.CommandText: select HCO_CODE, [3TL_YN] from refHCO where [3TL_YN] <> 0 and HCO_CODE = @HCO_CODE
select * from CORRESPONDENCE WHERE HCO_CODE = @HCO_CODE and YEAR_MONTH = @YEAR_MONTH

select rc.HCO_CODE, rc.YEARMONTH as YEAR_MONTH, t.ID, t.DQR_STATUS from
(select HCO_CODE, HCO_NAME, (cast(YEAR(l.DIS_END_DATE) AS VARCHAR) + CAST(FORMAT(l.DIS_END_DATE, 'MM') AS VARCHAR)) AS YEAR_MONTH , l.BATCH_ID , DQR_STATUS , FORMAT(CONVERT(DATE, CAST((cast(YEAR(l.DIS_END_DATE) AS VARCHAR) + CAST(FORMAT(l.DIS_END_DATE, 'MM') AS VARCHAR)) AS varchar) + '01'), 'MMM yyyy', 'en-US') AS YEAR_MONTH_CONVERT , [3TL_YN] , ds.ID from DQR_MANAGER as dm join refDQRStatus as ds on dm.DQR_STATUS_ID = ds.ID join portal_engine.dbo.[3T_File_Submission_Log] as l on dm.BATCH_ID = l.BATCH_ID join BATCH_PROV as bp on l.BATCH_ID = bp.BATCH_ID join global.dbo.refHCO as ref on bp.PROVNUM = ref.PROVNUM where FTP_FILENAME like '%_3T') as t right join RefCal_HCO_Cross as rc on t.HCO_CODE = rc.HCO_CODE and t.YEAR_MONTH = rc.YEARMONTH
where rc.DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(Year,-1,GETDATE()) AND DATEADD(Month,+1,GETDATE()) and ([3TL_YN] <> 0 or [3TL_YN] is NULL) and rc.HCO_CODE = @HCO_CODE and rc.YEARMONTH = @YEAR_MONTH order by YEAR_MONTH desc, BATCH_ID desc

Style.BackgroundColor: =iif(IsNothing(Fields!ID.Value) , "#EE4266", SWITCH( Fields!ID.Value = 1, "#EE4266", Fields!ID.Value = 2, "#FFD23F", Fields!ID.Value = 3, "#3BCEAC", Fields!ID.Value = 4, "#0EAD69", Fields!ID.Value = 5, "#540D6E", Fields!ID.Value = 6, "#5eb6ff"))

Query.CommandText: select t.HCO_CODE, t.HCO_NAME, MONTH_YEAR, YEAR_MONTH, COUNT(YEAR_MONTH) as CNT_YEAR_MONTH, MAX(FP_YEAR_MONTH) as FP_YEAR_MONTH, COUNT(FP_YEAR_MONTH) as CNT_FP_YEAR_MONTH, [3TL_YN], DATE, DAY_OF_WEEK_TEXT, LEFT(DAY_OF_WEEK_TEXT, 2) as DAY_OF_WEEK_ABV, MONTH_NAME, DAY_OF_MONTH, WEEK_OF_MONTH, DAY_OF_WEEK_NUM from (select distinct r.HCO_CODE, r.HCO_NAME ,FORMAT(CONVERT(DATE, r.YYYYMMDD), 'MMM yyyy', 'en-US') as MONTH_YEAR ,YEARMONTH as YEAR_MONTH ,CAST(YEAR(DISCHARGE_DATE) AS VARCHAR) + CAST(FORMAT(DISCHARGE_DATE, 'MM') AS VARCHAR) AS FP_YEAR_MONTH, DATE, DAY_OF_WEEK_TEXT, MONTH_NAME, FORMAT(CONVERT(DATE, r.YYYYMMDD), 'dd', 'en-US') as DAY_OF_MONTH, DATEPART(ww, DATE) as WEEK_OF_MONTH, DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DATE) as DAY_OF_WEEK_NUM from refcal_hco_cross as r left join (select hco_code, DISCHARGE_DATE from PORTAL_ENGINE.dbo.factPatient where discharge_date >= dateadd(YEAR,-1,getdate()) ) as p on r.DATE = p.DISCHARGE_DATE and r.HCO_CODE = p.HCO_CODE where r.date between dateadd(MONTH,-132,getdate()) and dateadd(MONTH,2,getdate()) ) as t join GLOBAL.dbo.refhco as r on t.hco_code = r.HCO_CODE where MONTH_YEAR BETWEEN DATEADD(Year,-1,GETDATE()) AND DATEADD(Month,+1,GETDATE()) and t.HCO_CODE = @HCO_CODE and YEAR_MONTH = @YEAR_MONTH group by t.HCO_CODE, t.HCO_NAME, MONTH_YEAR, YEAR_MONTH, [3TL_YN], DATE, DAY_OF_WEEK_TEXT, MONTH_NAME, DAY_OF_MONTH, WEEK_OF_MONTH, DAY_OF_WEEK_NUM order by DATE

select distinct FTP_FILENAME from vwFILE_SUBMISSION_LOG
where HCO_CODE = @HCO_CODE and YEAR_MONTH = @YEAR_MONTH and FTP_FILENAME like '%_3T'

SELECT HCO_CODE, HCO_NAME, YEAR_MONTH, BATCH_ID, DQR_STATUS, FORMAT(CONVERT(DATE, CAST(YEAR_MONTH AS varchar) + '01'), 'MMM yyyy', 'en-US') AS YEAR_MONTH_CONVERT FROM dbo.vwFileDetail WHERE HCO_CODE = @HCO_CODE and YEAR_MONTH = @YEAR_MONTH ORDER BY YEAR_MONTH
